Right, forgot about that. Statement hereby withdrawn :D [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_biggrin.png] I'll still waith though with all the other stuff coming around in the near future.

As much as I dislike these nightmare decks for the sheer silliness of them, I am still really intrigued to see what they come up with for each scenario. Dead Marshes is probably the most-anticipated for me, though I can't coherently say why. Emyn Muil could be interesting as well. We'll have to see, though, I suppose!

Wish they ahd their playmats and deck boxes available to purchase as well when Nightmare goes PoD.

That Legolas.... mmmmm.

all nightmare quests is amazing. but you must wait them fo ages..... ;) [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_wink.png]  :) [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_smile.png]
